concept.title: About HCL Sametime
concept.shortdesc: You can find information about the installed HCL Sametime product on the About window.

conbody.p: The About window displays product name, version and build level. This information is needed if you contact HCL support. To access the HCL Sametime information, click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Settings. Then click About HCL Sametime.
